text: Pheri jaba musale iccha gare, ki tyo vyaktila'i, juna ki uni duvaiko satru thiyo, samatihalun, taba tyasale bhanna thalyo ki junaprakarale hijo timile e'uta vyaktila'i marihaleka thiyau, tyasaiprakara mala'i pani marna cahanchau. Dharatima krura atyacari huna cahanchau ra timi yo cahamdainau ki sudhara garnevala bana
